@BunnySpeed said:
Happy Easter everyone! Of course, we're joining in, this year with a proper Easter Egg hunt. I've heard that sometimes Easter Eggs are appearing on BunnyCDN landing pages. I wonder what they could be

EDIT: They can be entered in the billing section after signup, no cards or payments required (but you need to enter your name/address first).

Great, found one but it's not working, code ends with "*VNP".

@pbx said:

show previous quotes

alexvolk said: found one but it's not working

Found a non working one as well. I guess that they can be used only once and sometimes two people find a code at the same time? Maybe they'll work again later on... only @BunnySpeed knows!

That's strange, from what I can see I think it's due to account limits. Actually, everyone can find multiple codes, but to prevent abuse they're limited to 4 per account. If I'm wrong, please, by all means, open a ticket with the full code and we'll have a look.
